description: Waterproof, breathable 2.5-layer Hydratic shell trousers with mechanical stretch and comfort fit – HC Hydratic Trail Trousers M are great as a protective rain shell for everyday use and also work well on the trail. Made from recycled polyester with a pu membrane and pfc-free impregnation, they have an elasticated waist with drawcord adjustment plus velcro adjustments at the leg endings and mid-calves – very practical when biking or hiking. Two-way ventilation zippers in the sides, reflective detailing, and a printed pattern inside.
name: Fjallraven HC Hydratic Trail Trousers, Reg - Mens
